snippet: Phyllis Wise resigned as she and the school faced a lawsuit filed by a professor whose job offer she rescinded over his anti-Israel Twitter messages.
abstract: Phyllis Wise will resign as chancellor of University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, citing 'external issues;' Wise and University face several lawsuits including one filed by Prof Steven Salaita after Wise rescinded job offer over his anti-Israel Twitter messages.
lead_paragraph: Phyllis Wise resigned as she and the school faced a lawsuit filed by a professor whose job offer she rescinded over his anti-Israel Twitter messages.

headline.main: Illinois: Facing Lawsuit, School Chancellor Quits
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Facing Lawsuit, School Chancellor Quits
